page.title: 11A Sunday in Coatbridge
page.content: A Sunday in Coatbridge First of all I would get up and go to church at 11o'clock and that lasts about one hour.I go to the United Free Church. After that I have my lunch then go out to play with my friend. We would look after my pet rabbit which is a female called Snowy. Sometimes I go to B.&Q. our local D.I.Y. store which is open every Sunday. My dad might buy something for the house and we always have a look at the plants.After I have my Sunday dinner of roast meat, roast potatoes, and peas I go to my grans for a couple of hours . In the evening I watch t.v.
